message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.CR 

The paper proposes a cellular architecture that combines multiuser MIMO (MU-MIMO) downlink with opportunistic use of unlicensed ISM bands to establish device-to-device (D2D) cooperation. The paper discusses physical-layer cooperation scheme, resource allocation strategy, cooperative user scheduling and relay selection problem, and proposes a joint user scheduling and relay selection algorithm. These topics are related to network communication, information theory, system engineering, multimedia, and cryptography, which are covered by the arXiv CS sub-categories cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, and cs.CR.
